hero.title: Discover the Land of Endless Beauty
hero.description: Experience the magic of Turkey: where ancient history meets modern culture, and every moment becomes an unforgettable memory

destinations.title: Popular Destinations
destinations.seasonalInfo: Check local weather conditions and plan your trip accordingly.
destinations.localTips: Always respect local customs and be open to new experiences.

istanbul.title: Istanbul
istanbul.subtitle: The Crossroads of Cultures
istanbul.description: Istanbul has a rich history and vibrant modern attractions, bridging Europe and Asia. Discover ancient sites alongside bustling markets.

cappadocia.title: Cappadocia
cappadocia.subtitle: Land of Fairy Chimneys
cappadocia.description: Cappadocia is known for its unique landscape, rock formations, and ancient cave dwellings. Experience hot air balloon rides over the stunning valleys.

antalya.title: Antalya
antalya.subtitle: Turkish Riviera Gem
antalya.description: Antalya offers idyllic beaches, rich history and vibrant nightlife. Explore ancient ruins and relax by the sparkling Mediterranean Sea.

pamukkale.title: Pamukkale
pamukkale.subtitle: Cotton Castle of Travertines
pamukkale.description: Pamukkale is famous for its white travertine terraces and mineral-rich thermal waters. Enjoy a relaxing soak while admiring this natural wonder.

ephesus.title: Ephesus
ephesus.subtitle: Ancient City of Wonders
ephesus.description: Ephesus is known for its well-preserved ruins and ancient architecture. Explore the Library of Celsus, Amphitheatre, and Temple of Artemis.

blacksea.title: Black Sea
blacksea.subtitle: Mystical Coastal Region
blacksea.description: The Black Sea region of Turkey offers lush landscapes, charming coastal towns, and a rich cultural heritage. Explore its hidden gems and enjoy local hospitality.

travelGuide.title: Travel Guide
travelGuide.bestTimeDesc: Spring (April-May) and Autumn (September-November) offer mild weather perfect for exploring both historical sites and natural wonders.
travelGuide.gettingAroundDesc: Turkey offers excellent transportation options including domestic flights, high-speed trains, and comfortable buses connecting major cities.
